summary: My favorite thing about the Detective Pikachu movie so far is that it looks like we're getting the other generations' Pokémon in...
body: My favorite thing about the Detective Pikachu movie so far is that it looks like we’re getting the other generations’ Pokémon in it too and it’s not just set a Kanto/Gen 1 vacuum. I appreciate that the other generations get some love.

tags: pikachu is fluffy cute and good
summary: reblog if u support fluffy pikachu
one of the things i’ve noticed people complaining about is the fact that in the detective pikachu trailer, purin/jigglypuff is...
body:
one of the things i’ve noticed people complaining about is the fact that in the detective pikachu trailer, purin/jigglypuff is fluffy and not smooth, as they expected it’d be

but people seem to be forgetting that it’s mentioned that pukurin/wigglytuff is a very fluffy pokémon, and the same is implied for pupurin/igglybuff!!

pukurin’s crystal pokédex entry states: “the rich, fluffy fur that covers its body feels so good that anyone who feels it can’t stop touching it.” and pupurin’s alpha sapphire entry states that it “has a soft and plushy body that feels very much like a marshmallow.”

so pukurin is outright stated to be fluffy, and pupurin’s “plushness” also seems to be implying that it’s also pretty fluffy. to me, it makes sense that purin would also be fluffy, just like it is in the detective pikachu trailer!

i know not everyone likes the design choices and that’s all down to personal preference of course, but maybe this’ll make people feel less uncomfortable about that aspect of purin’s design, at least!

summary: okay so I know detective pikachu is based off a game or whatever but I'm not familiar with it so I'm wondering if this is just...
body: okay so I know detective pikachu is based off a game or whatever but I’m not familiar with it so I’m wondering if this is just some random cute pikachu that has an appetite for mystery OR is it our usual pikachu who’s turned into a hard, pessimistic lightning rat who got into solving crime after Ash was fucking murdered

blog.name: hypocrisyofandrewdobson
blog.title: The Hypocrisy of Andrew Dobson
blog.description:
Examples of the lies and double standards behind the facade of the infamous Tom Preston/Andrew Dobson(NOTE: the comments and opinions stated in Submissions and Asks are not necessarily my own)

MASTERPOST

summary: Dobson posted a journal on Facebook late last night stating his opinions on some movie trailers(and of course, the She-Ra...
body:
Dobson posted a journal on Facebook late last night stating his opinions on some movie trailers(and of course, the She-Ra reboot). And while there may not seem anything really wrong with that, I want to draw attention to two comments in particular…


First, Dobson once again trying to show what a good LGBT ally his his by going “Ha, Ha! No straight people in this cartoon!” when it’s blatantly apparent by all his recent tumblr posts that he’s just obsessed with them all being lesbians…


And then him going out of his way to mention a character and his family are white and implying that’s automatically a bad, terrible thing.

Because for those that don’t know, and for those that might need a reminder), Dobson looks like this.

This picture is also almost 5-10 years old, as Andrew Dobson is a cis straight white man in his late 30’s.
